TEXT.TITLE: CAREMARK <CMRK> COMPLETES UNIT SALE
TEXT.BODY: Caremark Corp said it completed the sale of its America's Pharmacy Inc unit to Newport Pharmaceuticals International Inc for 12 mln dlrs. America's Pharmacy, based in Des Moines, Iowa, provides prescription drugs and other health care products. Reuter
